review_text: Clear, useful, and well structured
He is awesome . I got lots of valuable information.
very helpful

Very nice and straightforward to the point. Without too much unnecessary talking, every lesson was really informative with potential tools that can improve your productivity in a very personal and effective way.
The video order in chapter 6 is not chronological.

Very helpful!

Mike teaches some interesting techniques to really stay focused and prioritize correctly. I am implementing one of his advice right now.
Very educational.

Far better than I expected. The information and tips given were concise and extremely helpful. Regardless of what area of expertise one is in or whether one is a Fiverr seller or not, I would highly recommend this to anyone wishing to improve on their productivity, time management and overall lifestyle.
I also love how he recommends other sources to further improve knowledge in productivity.
Awesome short content... easy to digest.
Great course! Some real gems in here

The course gives A LOT of ways how you can make sure you are more effective / efficient with your time. They are general enough that they should work in almost every branch, yet detailed enough to actually make use of it.

However, the course would only work if one would pick *some* of the ideas from the big pool of ideas it brings forward. If one would do all the things, it would take 2-4 hours a day, probably not being very efficient or effective for productivity :P
It's great the topics are engaging
Simple and effective for people struggling with planning and productivity

I am very happy that I took this course, I found it very interesting and helpful. I even took notes which I thought would help me in the near future as I explore my options in life. This course helped me a lot seeing that I was having trouble getting my priorities straight. My thoughts were all over the place, but now that I have a better understanding of prioritizing I am sure that I will handle things better now.

Excellent course. I think it would be helpful for Mike to use a lot more real life examples to explain and emphasize his points. He used some examples from his own life but a lot more could be added to make it more effective and easier to remember and understand his points I believe.
Are there any written examples of his ideas,  or templates to follow etc.? That would be very helpful!
Course was clear enough but way too short. Not enough examples and some errors on the chapters' appearance. Nevertheless, I still found value, thank you!

Short and sweet with lots of great techniques! Mike has a positive and calm demeanor which made it a pleasant experience to watch and listen to him. Some of the techniques he mentioned, I was already familiar with. Others I didn't know. But the ones I knew, worked great for me in the past so I am excited to try out the new strategies that Mike introduced. I suffer from ADD so focusing on my tasks post a huge struggle at times but thanks to Mike's course, I feel prepared to improve my performance and be less stressed :)

I took this course because I am going to start posting gigs on Fiverr and I'm so glad I did. There isn't anything too new about the things he talks about, all common sense. But it is worth the price and time to learn and put things down on paper. Defiantly worth it.

Absolutely Amazing Course! 
Even though it's short and in one of the chapters the quiz was before the video itself, the content that is being provided is literally LIFE-CHANGING! I truly recommend this outstanding course. üëè

Great Course! 
Everyone should listen in on this quick course, there were more golden nuggets than I could count! 
Highly recommended! 
Thanks!
